tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge Stude at the wheel of the ship.
A mermaid fights a shark-faced merman.
C'tarnid's giant tentacles wrap around the Crying Innsman
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
Megumi turns into Yggdryad. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands Ranzo and Armed Lava.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth, showing teeth. Darkness.
Text, 48, Malice at 100 meters per second
People mingle outside of a stadium.
Text, 3 years ago, Galaxia Heroes: Burst World Tour Championships
Kei, with shorter blond hair, stares determinedly.
Sylvia enters the ring, waving at the crowds.
Sylvia presses button on her VR chair. She looks at Kei and smiles.
Sylvia and Kei sit in chairs on opposite sides of the ring
A vizor closes over Kei, smiling excitedly. A visor closes over Sylvia, smiling smugly.
Crowds watch screens. Lava and Metius appear in a post-apocalyptic colosseum.
Metius runs, summersaults, and kicks
Lava blocks a kick, then catches the next kick and throws Metius across the ring.
Metius flying kicks, and Lava catches
Lava smashes Metius
Metius spins
Metius flying kicks from above
Kei's vizor rises. He stumbles out of his chair, then falls to his hands and knees.
She holds out a hand
She stands straight and smiles
She walks away and waves at the crowd, smiling wide
Rakuro walks down a city street. Cars drive by. He no longer wears a gas mask
He passes a convenience store
Sylvia wears a disguise.
He remembers his gas mask
Riot Blood
Sylvia's eyes drift to a poster for Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro follows her gaze
Sylvia runs out and down the street
Sylvia
Grand Supreme Hotel
Sylvia walks across the lobby.
Her disguise of face mask, sun glasses, and floppy hat lie on the bed. She drinks coffee through a straw.
She drinks again
She gets a call from Johnson
She throws the phone on the bed
Her visor lowers
Rakuro lies on his hotel bed
He looks at the VR chair
Under games, he types "Shangri-la Frontier Download Version"
Dialog, Logging in, Rl'yath, abandoned house.
He walks onto a second floor terrace.
Hundreds of fish swim above the town
Sunraku parkours across town. Bioluminescent coral dots streets and buildings.
A yellow fish with brown spots passes his foot
A fish flails and splashes in place above him
A giant splash over the buildings behind him. The regacles emerges and roars
The regacles screams as an orca bites its neck
The orca's face is covered in fire and lightning
The regacles struggles. The shark bites down. The regacles opens its mouth and fires a beam.
The orca tail slaps the regacles
Sunraku parkours across rooftops
He parkours across a balcony railing and over a roof
The orca drives the falling regacles into the ground
The regacles tremors, then swims
The orca bites down on its body
The regacles writhes. The orca's tail crackles.
The tail begins to glow
A sphere of light explodes, washing Sunraku in brilliant light. The Regacles screams.
The orca swims leisurely. The Regacles crashes to the street.
The regacles dissipates into pixels, dropping a large fin. Pixels float up
The orca swims in the floating pixels, consuming them.
Label, Rare Enemy, Atlanticus Lepnorca
The orca chomps pixels
The orca's eye focuses
It swims nearby. Sunraku walks to the dropped fin.
He picks up the fin
2 yellow eyes stare down at him from a face of roaring blue fire
The orca dives. Sunraku dodges and runs.
The orca smashes through buildings, following Sunraku
Chunks of building crack and fall
He looks behind. The orca fills the width of the street, only a house behind him.
Its 2 side fins glow and crackle
They fire a pair of lightning strikes. Sunraku corners into an alley
An orb of light forms around the orca
He leaps over rubble. A wall crackles. He turns. The orca erupts through the wall
An orca fin approaches Sunraku. He looks at his wrist.
Debris and lightning spread across a cloud of sand
The cloud fades, and Sunraku is gone.
The orca swims off
Sunraku lies flat near rubble
His fingers quiver
Rakuro smiles in the chair
The orca swims
The orca lowers, close to the ground
Its fins glow and crackle
The orca's entire body glows and crackles and burns
The orca opens its mouth, and charges a beam

It fires. For a second, the world goes black and white. An energy orb shoots down the street, shattering houses in its wake. Sunraku disappears in a brilliant light. The strike flies half a mile through the city. From behind the tower, light and rubble explode in all directions. From a distance, light and destruction ripples across the city.
Emul sits up in bed
She falls back and closes her eyes
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds Ducsuram and stands in Ruluiath.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across Ruluiath, an underwater city. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and Megumi walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. Psyger in a yellow demon mask. Ranzo, the old samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
Text, 38, Professional - The style of a professional giant killer
On a dirt ground, a fallen knight dissipates into red pixels.
Nearby players also dissipate.
Pencilgon stands alone in front of craggy outcroppings, wearing her PKer outfit
She lies in mud
They fall in a pit
They look up. She holds a spear.
A female player walks down an alley
Pencilgon, hiding behind a barrel, spears the player in the chest
She exits the alley
A crowd of players surrounds the exit
giant bomb
Text, Self Destruct
Towa takes off her VR goggles and blushes with joy
